Search Price Max Beds Baths Wycliffe Golf Country Club Wellington Wycliffe Golf Country Club Homes For Sale Map Wycliffe Golf Country Club Homes Sold Ready to ‚Äútake a swing at living in paradise‚Äù? Wycliffe Golf & Country Club is perfect for anyone looking for a seasonal, vacation, or full-time residence in the heart of Wellington, Florida. This 600-acre gated community is separated into 14 different neighborhoods featuring coach homes, villas, and single-family homes. There are 1,045 properties in this mandatory membership community. The architecture is Mediterranean and most of the homes feature an open floor plan, gourmet kitchens, high ceilings, crown molding, walk-in closets, and master suites. The homes have gorgeous views of the golf course, lake, or garden. Residency opens up the opportunity to have a full golf, tennis, or social membership. Platinum, Gold, and Silver Membership Options There are three levels of membership that you can choose from but all of them include full access and use of: Clubhouse Grande Lounge Dining Room Grille Room Tennis Courts Resort Style Swimming Pool Fitness Center Spa Card Rooms Meeting Rooms The Platinum Membership is the full golf membership and is for members who want to have full use of the two championship golf courses. Platinum Members receive a number one computerized golf tee time priority rating. The Gold Membership is for the less avid golfer. The Silver Membership is for the social¬†and tennis members. It is perfect for those that do not wish to play golf but still want to enjoy the country¬†club lifestyle and all of the amenities¬†listed above. In addition to the listed benefits, there are also plenty of social activities to keep you busy including trivia nights, card parties, book clubs, themed dinner, dances, and more. The Wycliffe Golf & Country Club features delicious, healthy dining options for brunch, lunch, and dinner. They have The Grille for more casual dining and the Grande Dining Room for a more refined dining experience. Visit WycliffeCC.com for more information about the membership levels. Ready to Live in Paradise? If you are interested in joining the Wycliffe Golf & Country Club lifestyle, we would love to show you the inventory of available homes.
